summary: This mod adds the ability to cook health, magicka, and stamina ultimate, extreme, and vogorous potions
descriptionHtml:
Hello! This mod allows a player to create health, stamina, and magicka potions with the title vigorous, extreme, and ultimate in the cookpot with moderately easy to obtain ingredients.
Updates:
NOW INCLUDING BLOOD POTIONS!!!
This mod will have a slight quest line in order to obtain:
Find Darkwater Crossing, go to the Darkwater pass and find the book that sits on a 
pedestal. 
[Notes] This mod should not have any issue with compatability to other mods.
This mod does not have a map quest marker.
author: ragdoll77
